name: Ioniser
description:
made for the xanderjam 2021

opposite attract-How it fits- You play as a girl who is trapped in a lab, she has to utilize her ability to manipulate the charge of objects

My first time making a platformer so there will be bugs considering the "unique physics" (you'll know when u play ha ha)

art and coding were made for the jam except for the dialogue system cuz I wasn't bothered

made by carlos

Edit: some stuff i didn't make clear in the game: at the top left is your charge

It can be red or blue

If you have 0 charge u won't be attracted or repelled

You can still lose charge even if it's 0

Opposite charges attract, but the same charges repel
